title: How do I save battery power?
answer:
When you are not using the phone, press the power key to turn off the screen.
ƒÜ Set the screen timeout period to a small value under Settings > Display > Sleep.
ƒÜ Lower the screen brightness under Settings > Display > Brightness.
ƒÜ Turn off Wi-Fi and Bluetooth when you do not need to use them under Settings >
WIRELESS & NETWORKS.
ƒÜ Turn off data sync by turn off Accounts & sync for your account under Settings >
Account.
ƒÜ Turn off data services by deselecting Data enabled under Settings > Mobile networks.
ƒÜ Turn off GPS by deselecting GPS satellites under Settings > Location access.
